replies.body: How many fucking Ashe skins do you people need?

Cait and Miss Fortune have been getting just as many. They both have like 3 epic skins and 1 legendary (mf ultimate)

At least Aurelion Sol, Braum and Lulu got a skin for once. h y p e

I don't hecraim should've been nerfed, he's already really fking weak. Celerity needs needs a slight buff. Good job on nexus blitz 10/10. Sudden impact nerf is trash. Scorch should be reverted to help champions that struggle in lane ( solo q no jungler ). Aery good nerf. The tanks nerf are why.. Tanks aren't even played ( solo q ) needs to get reverted + buffed. Wukong nerf is good but needs a little more health, if he falls behind he's useless. All i got time for guys thx for listening to me im lvl 28.
Can't tell if you're trolling but tanks and hecarim got buffed didn't they?

Did... did you even read the page?

"Hecarim is pretty weak currently, but we want to be careful about how we buff him. A bit more extended dps should help him shine in the mid-game"

Pretty sure he's referring to the Celerity nerf and I agree. Riot took % MS off it and increased the MS to AD/AP conversion, then lowered the MS to AD/AP conversion in this patch instead of just reverting the original change.
rito didn't you say urgot's skin would not be part of an existing skin line?

> rito didn't you say _urgot_'s skin would not be part of an existing skin line?

Not really sure what you're talking about there, there's literally no mention of Urgot in the patch notes. Are you referring to another champ?
In the past when discussing upcoming skins they said urgots would be brand new concept

The only thing I remember like that recently was from the ask Riot when talking about how they choose skins. They said sometimes it's "let's make a new skin in this line" and sometimes it's let's make a new skin to fit this champion", and that the upcoming skins for Aurelion and Urgot were one of each which fits.

Of course you could also argue that it is a new concept, because while they are part of the High Noon skin line it's being taken in a whole new direction with these three skins, but that doesn't line up with what Eldritch remembers.
And how is that supposed to relate to something that doesn't even make mention of Urgot, let alone an Urgot skin?
Revert Urgot so I can get to diamond

Most recent changes to Amumu aren't showing on me or my friend's games...

Rito help plz

LOL Tahm W from 14s to 28s ??? Please rito, this is just sad.
Tahm is not viable in games anymore, what's the point of nerfing him 2 times in a row?
At least give him a new skin. Any of you know how many skins Tahm Kench has?

Where the fuck is gnars buff? He's a tank with less health, armor, magic resist, range, attack damage, attackspeed, movement speed, than most adc????
How does that even make sense, how the hell is a champion with tank as one of his roles gonna have less health, armor, mr than most adc's???? HOW??
Maybe release victorious Quinn :)
No riot why did u nerve my two main champs Quinn and Fizz and the runes I use for them celerity and sudden impact! :(
Quinn needs far more nerfing than that!

She's already weak early game due to the last nerf (Base Armour Nerf). The Lethality Burst (Sudden Impact) nerf is indirect to her as well as Electrocute. So I think Riot has done a good job in that area.
I feel like the Tahm W cooldown increase is a bit too steep, like nearly half a minute at level 1 is a bit of an oof

As Wukong{{champion:62}}  has already been weak on the top or in the jungle with the most outdated kit and nearly no passive, Riot you really dared to nerf him again?!{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

Oh don't even start to tell me how Wukong can one-shot adc or ap, now he can't even live through his laning phase.
good work riot way to ruin {{champion:62}}  nerfed twice as well as runes being nerfed good job ####heads

Just played nexus blitz for the first time. holy hell its more toxic than normals. im sorry not a PBE player but if riots planning to get new players ppl need to learn to be more repectful not THIS type of player experience
